premise_source_doc_sentence: Michael Carlyle Hall  (  born February 1 , 1971  )  is an American actor , known for his role as Dexter Morgan , a serial killer and blood spatter analyst , in the Showtime TV Network series Dexter , and as David Fisher in the HBO drama series Six Feet Under .

claim: Michael C. Hall is a director.
